 2005-22592005-11-28,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of MERRI BEATTIE of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a full-time permanent member of the Public Service Staffing Tribunal to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years, effective January 30, 2006.
